title: RMA Help Please
content:
Hi

I have been trying to log a RMA here https://store.google.com/uk/repair since last week but it never opens and does not state what its business hours are ?

I have tried talking to @madebygoogle on twitter and that was a waste of time :(

Its taken so long I have had to buy a new phone and its not a Google one :)

Can anyone help me log a RMA please ?

Thank you

Simon
